method.name: create
method.description: Create a page into the given folder

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The page filename. Extension not included, all pages are .php.

parameter.name: $pageContent
parameter.description: The page content. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: update
method.description: Update an already existing page. This includes moving it from one folder to another.

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The page's filename. Must be with extension.

parameter.name: $folderID
parameter.description: The page's folder id. If different from original, the page will be moved.

parameter.name: $sitemap
parameter.description: Indicator whether this page will be included in the Redback's sitemap.

parameter.name: $pageContent
parameter.description: The page content. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: engageModule
method.description: Engage a page to load a module.

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module to connect to the given page.

parameter.name: $static
parameter.description: Indicator whether this page's module content will be loaded statically or async.

parameter.name: $attributes
parameter.description: An array of attributes for the page builder.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: remove
method.description: Remove a page from the system.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: info
method.description: Get page information by page id.

parameter.name: $pageID
parameter.description: The page id to get the information for.

method.returndescription: An array of all page information.

method.name: getFolderPages
method.description: Get all pages inside a given folder.

parameter.name: $folderID
parameter.description: The folder id to get the pages from.

parameter.name: $pageID
parameter.description: The page id to load the content from.

method.name: load
method.description: Loads the page file to be executed. Throws an exception if the page doesn't exist.
method.returndescription: The page output, usually the page html.

method.name: path
method.description: Get the full path of the page

parameter.name: $pageID
parameter.description: The page id to get the path for.

method.name: buildModulePage
method.description: Build a specific module-connected page content.

parameter.name: $pageID
parameter.description: The page id to connect the module to.
